akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5705. Exemption Chapter 10 of title 5 shall not apply to the Panel, the Yukon River Joint Technical Committee, or the Advisory Committee created under section 5704 of this title. (Pub. L. 104–43, title VII, § 706, Nov. 3, 1995, 109 Stat. 394; Pub. L. 117–286, § 4(a)(126), Dec. 27, 2022, 136 Stat. 4319.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2022—Pub. L. 117–286 substituted “Chapter 10 of title 5” for “The Federal Advisory Committee Act (5 U.S.C. App.)”.
